attributes.action: Stop the increase of the M6 Toll, as of 1st March 2010 it is due for another increase
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Stop the increase of the M6 Toll, as of 1st March 2010 it is due for another increase, when this increase goes ahead it will mean the toll has increased by 100% since the road was opened
